summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing a grant amendment with the State of Washington Department of Ecology (DOE) for grant assistance to support the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation's 1995 Milfoil Harvesting and Bottom Screening program; increasing the expenditure allowances in the Department's 1995 Budget, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
